workflow_4_automatic_document_backup.name: Automatic Document Backup to Google Drive
workflow_4_automatic_document_backup.description: Auto-save all generated documents to Google Drive with organization

actions.code:
# Parse incoming document data
import json
from datetime import datetime

input_data = input.get('document_data')
doc = json.loads(input_data)

# Generate folder structure
folder_path = f"Agent_5.0/{doc['category']}/{doc['case_name']}"
filename = f"{doc['document_type']}_{datetime.now().strftime('%Y%m%d')}.pdf"

return {'folder_path': folder_path, 'filename': filename}
